original_text: But their land is also full of useless idols. They worship things that they have made with their own hands.
korean_text: 그 땅에는 우상도 가득하므로 그들이 자기 손으로 짓고 자기 손가락으로 만든 것을 경배하여

sentences.original_text: But their land is also full of useless idols.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들의 땅 역시 쓸모없는 우상으로 가득 차 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: that they have made with their own hands.
